DOC.brief_summary: Comparing a pharmacokinetic model of a short sevoflurane sedation in burn ICU patients with control ICU patients.
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study of Sevoflurane Inhalation in Burn ICU Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective clinical study in ICU with sedated ventilated patients with sevoflurane with the AnaCondaÂ® system, establishing pharmacokinetic model of sevoflurane and its metabolites (hydroxyfluroisopropanol, fluoride) comparing burn and non burn ICU patients
DOC.criteria: Adult patients ventilated requiring invasive procedure in ICU Stable respiratory and hemodynamic conditions Consent of patients or family Arterial line Burn patients : burn area between 20 and 50% (3rd degree) OR non burn patients BMI <30 Sevoflurane anaphylaxia
